inclusion.criterion: Capacity for giving written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Carotid stenosis of > 30% by ultrasound criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Systolic BP < 170 and diastolic BP < 100 under resting conditions
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Negative pregnancy test if female of child-bearing potential
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Myocardial infarction, unstable angina or critical limb ischemia
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications to MRI (claustrophobia, presence of pacemakers, defibrillators, metal foreign bodies)
exclusion.label: unknown
